summary: Implemented a single-route PhysioTrack landing page with a Daily Check-in flow, scoring utilities, and a warm earth-tone theme; however, the required generated image assets are not shown as added, and Internet Identity/auth-related scaffolding was introduced despite being a stated non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add generated static image assets under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames and render them on the page.
missing_requirements.reason: The landing page references the generated image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, so the AC about the files being present cannot be verified from the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider/hook and identity-based actor creation wiring (login/logout/auth client).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists Internet Identity login/authentication as a non-goal; nevertheless, the diff adds Internet Identity context/hooks and wraps the app with the provider.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query client/provider setup for backend interaction scaffolding.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for a frontend-only, no-persistence landing/check-in UI; added infrastructure appears unrelated to requirements.
Backend work was not required (no persistence/non-goals); adding a backend file is not requested and provides no described functionality.
